DOC.brief_summary: A study to evaluate safety and tolerability of BMS-986012 in patients with small cell lung cancer
DOC.brief_title: Study of BMS-986012 in Subjects With Small Cell Lung Caner
DOC.criteria: For more information regarding BristolMyers Squibb Clinical Trial participation, please visit www.BMSStudyConnect.com Histological or cytological confirmed small cell lung cancer (SCLC) Eastern Cooperative Oncology Group Performance Status 01 at least one measurable lesion that is not amenable to resection. Adequate organ function Symptomatic central nervous system (CNS) metastases Grade â‰¥ 2 peripheral neuropathy Uncontrolled or significant cardiac disease Active or chronic infection with Human Immunodeficiency Virus(HIV), Hepatitis B Virus (HBV), or Hepatitis C Virus (HCV) Other protocol defined inclusion/exclusion criteria could apply
